sentences.en: Bleasdale had written the role expressly for Robert Lindsay.
sentences.cn: 布利斯戴尔专门为罗伯特·林赛写了这个角色。

sentences.en: For this production she has learnt the role in Spanish.
sentences.cn: 为了这次演出，她已经学会了用西班牙语演这个角色。

sentences.en: Group members have to communicate with each other through role-play.
sentences.cn: 小组成员必须通过角色扮演互相交流。

sentences.en: He praised her role in the struggle against apartheid.
sentences.cn: 他称赞了她在反种族隔离制的斗争中发挥的重要作用。

sentences.en: His new role could confirm him as one of our leading actors.
sentences.cn: 他的新角色会确保他跻身我们的一流演员之列。

sentences.en: I don't see my role as foisting my beliefs on them.
sentences.cn: 我没觉得是自己把想法强加在他们身上。

sentences.en: Integrating the kids with the community, finding them a role, is essential.
sentences.cn: 使孩子融入社区并为他们找到某个角色非常必要。

sentences.en: Jennifer responded with anger and played the martyr role.
sentences.cn: 珍妮弗做出愤怒的反应，开始大倒苦水。

sentences.en: Matthews plays the role of a young doctor suspected of murder.
sentences.cn: 马修斯扮演一名涉嫌谋杀的年轻医生。

sentences.en: Rehearse and role-play the interview with a friend beforehand.
sentences.cn: 事先和朋友通过角色扮演排练一下面试。

sentences.en: She has just landed the lead role in their latest production.
sentences.cn: 她刚在他们最新的作品中取得了主角。

sentences.en: Students have ambiguous feelings about their role in the world.
sentences.cn: 学生们对于自己在这个世界上的角色认识模糊不清。

sentences.en: The Catholic Church has played a prominent role throughout Polish history.
sentences.cn: 天主教会在整个波兰历史上曾发挥过举足轻重的作用。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has promised that Israel will play a constructive role.
sentences.cn: 首相承诺以色列将发挥积极的作用。

sentences.en: The role is played by seventeen-year-old Briton Jane March.
sentences.cn: 这个角色由17岁的英国人简·马奇扮演。

sentences.en: They are role models for thousands of young Latins.
sentences.cn: 他们是千万拉丁青年的榜样。

sentences.en: This role gave her something to get her teeth into.
sentences.cn: 这一角色让她全情投入其中。

sentences.en: Until now scientists had very little clear evidence about the drug's role in preventing more serious effects of infection.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，科学家们几乎没有该药物在防止更严重的感染后果的功能的明确证据。

phrases.tran_cn: 发挥作用；扮演一个角色
起主要作用， 起带头作用
n. 行为榜样；角色模特

trans.tran_en: the character played by an actor in a play or film
